description: The government of the Yunnan province in Western China is going after Coca-Cola over allegedly mapping the province with GPS devices. Tonight President Obama will speak to big money donors at an event for Organizing for Action. The group is run by former campaign aides with the mission of supporting the President's agenda. Since Organizing for Action is a 501(c)(4) non-profit, it can raise unlimited money without saying where it comes from. And is Tiger Woods poised for a comeback?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, March 13, 2013
byline: D Gorenstein, Mark Garrison, Gigi Douban, Sam Beard, John Sudworth, David Brancaccio, Allan Sloan, Jeremy Hobson and Scott Tong

title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, March 13, 2013
